content:
advertisement

With Penn State up two sets to none against NJIT Saturday Mark Pavlik told middle hitter Max Lipsitz that Jon Sherrick would replace him for the third set PERIOD

When Lipsitz told fellow middle hitter Max Holt Holt questioned why Lipsitz always gets to sit out PERIOD The players then jokingly held an argument over who was going to play as Pavlik listened over their shoulders PERIOD

 Lipsitz said PERIOD

Lipsitz got the set off after nursing a sore right shoulder for most of the week PERIOD

A week after missing the first match of his Penn State career Lipsitz returned to the court against NJIT with a performance that Pavlik called  Lipsitz had seven kills on  swings to post a . hitting percentage PERIOD He also tallied five blocks and only one service error PERIOD

 Holt said PERIOD 

The junior said his shoulder feels better and he has returned to normal activity PERIOD

 Lipsitz said PERIOD 

Because the No PERIOD  Nittany Lions have already clinched the EIVA regular season championship Pavlik has trimmed down on practice to maintain the teams focus and freshness PERIOD

Through his coaching experiences Pavlik has learned his team wont improve physical skills anymore this late in the season PERIOD The jumping and landing at practice takes a lot out of his players Pavlik said PERIOD

 Pavlik said PERIOD 

Pavlik said he has learned to let his players determine their injury status asking them frequently how they feel PERIOD

 Pavlik said PERIOD
